segments.advisor_message: Alright, so before we wrap up, can you confirm the full name of your dependent? I just want to make sure we have it right for the records.
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, it’s actually Emily Johnson. Wait, no, I think that was what I said before. I guess I should also mention she's, uh, 10 years old, born on 15-05-2013, right?

segments.advisor_message: Perfect, thanks for that. Now, do we have a date until which she'll be considered your dependent?
segments.client_message: Oh, um, I was thinking it might be until she turns 18, so that’s, like, until 15-05-2021. But... you know what? I think I might have mentioned earlier that it’s till she’s 21? Actually, never mind that, it's 21, yes.
